item.description: Hi I’m PlatinaSB. I’m still newbies to programming and taking major in Informatics Enginering. My main focus right now is learning python, typescript and flutter frameworks. using HUGO RN to diaplay this site. My Twitch : platinasb My GitHub : platinasb My socials : platina_sb
